mapper.insert: insert into SelectCourse.course (course_name, course_id, course_pass, course_max_student_number, course_credit, course_teacher_id) value (#{courseName}, #{courseId}, #{coursePass}, #{courseMaxStudentNumber}, #{courseCredit}, #{courseTeacherId})

insert into SelectCourse.classtime(course_id, course_location, class_week, class_start_time, class_end_time, class_number) value (#{courseId}, #{courseLocation}, #{classWeek}, #{classStartTime}, #{classEndTime}, #{classNumber})
mapper.select: select c1.course_id, c1.course_max_student_number, c1.course_name, c1.course_student_number, c1.course_credit, c1.course_teacher_id, t.teacher_name, c2.class_end_time, c2.class_start_time, c2.class_number, c2.class_week, c2.course_location from SelectCourse.course c1, SelectCourse.classtime c2, SelectCourse.teacher t where c1.course_id = c2.course_id and c1.course_pass = 1 and c1.course_teacher_id = t.teacher_id limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

select c1.course_id, c1.course_max_student_number, c1.course_name, c1.course_student_number, c1.course_credit, c1.course_teacher_id, t.teacher_name, c2.class_end_time, c2.class_start_time, c2.class_number, c2.class_week, c2.course_location from SelectCourse.course c1, SelectCourse.classtime c2, SelectCourse.teacher t where c1.course_id = #{courseId} and c1.course_id = c2.course_id and c1.course_pass = 1 and c1.course_teacher_id = t.teacher_id

select c1.course_id, c1.course_max_student_number, c1.course_name, c1.course_student_number, c1.course_credit, c1.course_teacher_id, t.teacher_name, c2.class_end_time, c2.class_start_time, c2.class_number, c2.class_week, c2.course_location from SelectCourse.course c1, SelectCourse.classtime c2, SelectCourse.teacher t where c2.course_location = #{courseLocation} and c1.course_id = c2.course_id and c1.course_pass = 1 and c1.course_teacher_id = t.teacher_id

select c1.course_id, c1.course_max_student_number, c1.course_name, c1.course_student_number, c1.course_credit, c1.course_teacher_id, t.teacher_name, c2.class_end_time, c2.class_start_time, c2.class_number, c2.class_week, c2.course_location, c1.course_pass from SelectCourse.course c1, SelectCourse.classtime c2, SelectCourse.teacher t where c1.course_teacher_id = #{teacherId} and c1.course_id = c2.course_id and c1.course_teacher_id = t.teacher_id limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

select c1.course_id, c1.course_max_student_number, c1.course_name, c1.course_student_number, c1.course_credit, c1.course_teacher_id, c1.course_pass, t.teacher_name, c2.class_end_time, c2.class_start_time, c2.class_number, c2.class_week, c2.course_location from SelectCourse.course c1, SelectCourse.classtime c2, SelectCourse.teacher t where c1.course_id = c2.course_id and c1.course_teacher_id = t.teacher_id
